bibl.title: Sky, Sex and Sun. The Meanings of αἰδοῖος / αἰδοῖον in the Derveni Papyrus. Translated by Michael CHASE.
bibl.note: 1. The version of the Orphic theogony commented in the Derveni papyrus. - 2. The cosmological interpretation of the Orphic theogony. - 3. Objections and answers.
bibl.seg: BRISSON Luc, Sky, Sex and Sun. The Meanings of αἰδοῖος / αἰδοῖον in the Derveni Papyrus. Translated by Michael CHASE.
1. The version of the Orphic theogony commented in the Derveni papyrus. - 2. The cosmological interpretation of the Orphic theogony. - 3. Objections and answers.
